InstructionData.Title: Temperature Reader
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Temperature Reader 1.1​ # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library​ alias Sensor d0​ # alias Bias d1​ alias temperature r0​ alias bias r1​ alias celsius r2​ move celsius 0​ move bias 0​ start:​ l temperature Sensor Temperature​ # l bias Bias Setting​ add temperature temperature bias​ blez celsius outputtemp​ sub temperature temperature 273.15​ outputtemp:​ s db Setting temperature​ yield​ j start
